name: Percipience, Silent Dawn
simple_desc: Deals minor Wind DMG to a single enemy and has a chance of applying Arcana to the target. After targets are inflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock, each respectively has a chance of additionally applying Arcana.
desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to #1[i]% of Black Swan's ATK to a single target enemy, with a #2[i]% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana. And if the hit target currently has Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock applied to them, each respectively has a #3[i]% base chance of inflicting 1 extra stack of Arcana onto the enemy.
